import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Card=_ref=>{let{children,className=''}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`bg-white rounded-lg shadow p-4 ${className}`,children:children});};const isCoordinates=input=>{const coordPattern=/^[-+]?([1-8]?\d(\.\d+)?|90(\.0+)?),\s*[-+]?(180(\.0+)?|((1[0-7]\d)|([1-9]?\d))(\.\d+)?)$/;return coordPattern.test(input);};const Input=_ref2=>{let{...props}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{...props,className:"w-full px-4 py-2 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500"});};const Button=_ref3=>{let{onClick,children,disabled}=_ref3;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onClick,className:`px-4 py-2 rounded-lg text-white font-medium ${disabled?'bg-gray-400 cursor-not-allowed':'bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-600 active:bg-blue-700'}`,disabled:disabled,children:children});};const PropertyAssessmentTool=()=>{const[searchInput,setSearchInput]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[results,setResults]=useState(null);const[error,setError]=useState('');const[googleLoaded,setGoogleLoaded]=useState(false);const[map,setMap]=useState(null);const[marker,setMarker]=useState(null);const[searchCircle,setSearchCircle]=useState(null);const mapRef=useRef(null);const GOOGLE_API_KEY='AIzaSyBf5WWjQksCtxIziKvs7kFq4qjPCf6SoZQ';const SEARCH_RADIUS=3000;// 3km radius
useEffect(()=>{// Check if Google Maps is already loaded
if(window.google&&window.google.maps){setGoogleLoaded(true);initMap();return;}// Create a callback function that Google Maps can call when loaded
window.initGoogleMaps=()=>{setGoogleLoaded(true);initMap();};// Load the Google Maps script
const script=document.createElement('script');script.src=`https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=${GOOGLE_API_KEY}&libraries=places&callback=initGoogleMaps`;script.async=true;script.defer=true;script.onerror=error=>{console.error('Error loading Google Maps:',error);setError('Failed to load Google Maps. Please check your internet connection and try again.');};document.head.appendChild(script);return()=>{// Cleanup
if(window.initGoogleMaps){delete window.initGoogleMaps;}const scriptElement=document.querySelector(`script[src*="maps.googleapis.com"]`);if(scriptElement){document.head.removeChild(scriptElement);}};},[]);const initMap=()=>{try{if(!mapRef.current||!window.google)return;// Default to center of US
const defaultLocation={lat:39.8283,lng:-98.5795};const mapInstance=new window.google.maps.Map(mapRef.current,{zoom:4,center:defaultLocation,mapTypeId:'roadmap',styles:[{featureType:"poi",elementType:"labels",stylers:[{visibility:"off"}]}]});// Add click listener
mapInstance.addListener('click',e=>{const clickedLocation={lat:e.latLng.lat(),lng:e.latLng.lng()};updateMarkerAndCircle(clickedLocation);analyzeLocation(clickedLocation);});setMap(mapInstance);}catch(error){console.error('Error initializing map:',error);setError('Failed to initialize map. Please refresh the page and try again.');}};const updateMarkerAndCircle=location=>{try{if(!map||!window.google)return;// Update or create marker
if(marker){marker.setPosition(location);}else{const newMarker=new window.google.maps.Marker({position:location,map:map,draggable:true});newMarker.addListener('dragend',()=>{const newLocation={lat:newMarker.getPosition().lat(),lng:newMarker.getPosition().lng()};updateMarkerAndCircle(newLocation);analyzeLocation(newLocation);});setMarker(newMarker);}// Update or create search radius circle
if(searchCircle){searchCircle.setCenter(location);}else{const newCircle=new window.google.maps.Circle({map:map,center:location,radius:SEARCH_RADIUS,fillColor:'#4299e1',fillOpacity:0.15,strokeColor:'#4299e1',strokeWeight:2});setSearchCircle(newCircle);}// Pan map to location
map.panTo(location);map.setZoom(14);}catch(error){console.error('Error updating marker and circle:',error);setError('Failed to update map markers. Please try again.');}};const analyzeLocation=async location=>{if(!map||!window.google){setError('Google Maps is not loaded. Please refresh the page.');return;}setLoading(true);setError('');try{const service=new window.google.maps.places.PlacesService(map);const geocoder=new window.google.maps.Geocoder();// Get nearby places with error handling
const nearbyPlaces=await new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{service.nearbySearch({location:location,radius:SEARCH_RADIUS,type:['establishment']},(results,status)=>{if(status==='OK'){resolve(results);}else if(status==='ZERO_RESULTS'){resolve([]);}else{reject(new Error(`Places API error: ${status}`));}});});// Process POI categories
const poiCategories={shopping:0,restaurant:0,school:0,park:0,transport:0};nearbyPlaces.forEach(place=>{const types=place.types;if(types.some(type=>['shopping_mall','store','supermarket','grocery_or_supermarket','convenience_store','department_store','retail'].includes(type))){poiCategories.shopping++;}if(types.some(type=>['restaurant','food','cafe','meal_takeaway','meal_delivery','bakery','bar','night_club'].includes(type))){poiCategories.restaurant++;}if(types.some(type=>['school','primary_school','secondary_school','university','elementary_school','middle_school','high_school'].includes(type))){poiCategories.school++;}if(types.some(type=>['park','playground','amusement_park','campground','rv_park','natural_feature'].includes(type))){poiCategories.park++;}if(types.some(type=>['transit_station','bus_station','train_station','subway_station','airport','light_rail_station','taxi_stand'].includes(type))){poiCategories.transport++;}});// Calculate POI score
const poiScore=Math.min(200,poiCategories.shopping*8+poiCategories.restaurant*10+poiCategories.school*20+poiCategories.park*12+poiCategories.transport*10);// Get place details using reverse geocoding
const placeDetails=await new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{geocoder.geocode({location},(results,status)=>{if(status==='OK')resolve(results[0]);else reject(status);});});// Mock sentiment data (in real app, would come from additional APIs)
const mockRating=4.2;const mockTotalRatings=85;const sentimentScore=Math.min(200,Math.round(mockRating/5*150+Math.min(50,mockTotalRatings/10)));// Set the results
setResults({poi:{score:poiScore,details:poiCategories},sentiment:{score:sentimentScore,details:{averageRating:mockRating.toFixed(1),totalReviews:mockTotalRatings,communityEngagement:mockTotalRatings>100?'High':mockTotalRatings>50?'Medium':'Low'}},propertyDetails:{address:placeDetails.formatted_address,coordinates:location,nearbyPOIs:nearbyPlaces.length}});// Log found places for debugging
console.log('Found Places:',nearbyPlaces.map(place=>({name:place.name,types:place.types})));}catch(error){console.error('Analysis error:',error);setError('Error analyzing location. Please try again.');}finally{setLoading(false);}};const handleSearchSubmit=async()=>{if(!searchInput.trim()){setError('Please enter an address or coordinates');return;}try{let location;if(isCoordinates(searchInput)){const[lat,lng]=searchInput.split(',').map(coord=>parseFloat(coord.trim()));location={lat,lng};}else{const geocoder=new window.google.maps.Geocoder();const result=await new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{geocoder.geocode({address:searchInput},(results,status)=>{if(status==='OK')resolve(results[0]);else reject(status);});});location={lat:result.geometry.location.lat(),lng:result.geometry.location.lng()};}updateMarkerAndCircle(location);analyzeLocation(location);}catch(error){setError('Could not find location.
